text: McLarenSaw that pic? guess how much
What she do ? Cannot see properly
Huh ? What you mean never open ?
I see normal straight hair only .
Got do thing meh ? . No colour . Only rebonding ?
You follow the current salon very long liao iszit ?
Cheap hair to maintain  $8/$10 cut once a year
What is decade plus ? My ang mo not so chim
You lucky got people pay 500 for a hair do
Yes  and McLaren still ask got rebonding?
You come my row salon for 10 year .. ? ðŸ¤”
Not true  my boy spent more on hair cut then my girl
Your hairdresser is a guy ? ðŸ¤”
My boy once a month  my girl once a year
Ask your boy keep long hair
I know which lady you saying liao la
Now on the trend colour lady like . Must upgrade to do it for them . In order to charge higher
He always don't want to cut shorter  very fast need cut again. Think is less than a month cut once
Cos got 2 shop mah ..
This lady cut for you last time open own shop want leh
Last time in OCS  he bought a shaver and they shave for each other. He knows how to shave for people
Good customer . I have a number of guy customer 1 month cut 4 time
No leh .. they come trim a little bit .. all need to maintain the style .
Yes .. 1 month 4 time confirm .. follow me for 10 year Liao
I see them also Sian sometimes ðŸ˜”
This type of biz built up over time  can't let go
Where got see you ? Never see you also ðŸ™ˆ
I go for cheaper cuts lah
Must set example for my kids
In hairdresser line .. we only look to upgrade skill and price .. ðŸ˜‚
Cos we are doing skill job .. not selling thing .
If I go expensive cuts  then my kids all want follow
Price cannot compare .. cheap or expensive.
U keep quite go cut they also don't know ðŸ˜‚
So how much discount u giving to members frm here
I give you free .. you come find me
No leh .. office job .
Give free also don dare to come find me .. very hard to please
Different type of customers  some want cheap  some want good. Doing a few ex ones better than doing many cheap ones
Next time I call your hair dresser to shave for you ..
One day go find u . Try try . But walk in as normal customer
Yea .. different customers have different pattern
I will tell her .. a guy do TCM at amk .. and stay Queenstown want
U wan him to avoid bmc forever ah
You walk in I know .. I have feelings ðŸ¤©
Lol unless ur shop seldom hav male customers walk in
Go people go peek at you before  you know?
